St._Joseph.Buchanan County Infirmary: Buchanan County Infirmary, also known as Buchanan County Poor Farm and Green Acres, is a historic hospital building located at St. Joseph, Missouri. It was built in 1919, and is a two-story, "F"-shaped Classical Revival-style building with a "fireproof' concrete structure, brick walls, and a cross-hip roof clad with red ceramic tiles.
